DefaultSegmentApplied.PluginDescription: Set a default segment to be automatically applied when viewing reports.
DefaultSegmentApplied.Description: This segment will be automatically applied when viewing reports (only when no segment is already in the URL).
DefaultSegmentApplied.InlineHelp: Example use case: If you are a mobile marketing manager and always need to see data filtered to mobile visitors, select a segment like %1$sBrowser type is mobile%2$s. Every time you open Matomo, your reports will automatically show mobile traffic only â€” no need to manually select the segment each time.
DefaultSegmentApplied.UserFallbackNote: If you leave this empty and an administrator has configured a default segment for all users, that segment will be used instead.
DefaultSegmentApplied.SystemDescription: This segment will be automatically applied for any user who has not set a personal default segment in their own settings.
DefaultSegmentApplied.SystemInlineHelp: Admin default: Choose a segment to apply by default for all users who have not configured their own personal default segment. Individual users can override this by setting a personal default segment in their Personal Settings.
